    • Method Detail

      • createHash

        public static java.lang.String[] createHash(java.lang.String password)
        This method calls PasswordHash.createHash(String). It then splits the returned String into salt and hashed password and then returns a String array containing those two
        Parameters:
        password - the plain text password that needs hashing
        Returns:
        a String Array containing the salt on String[0] and the hashed password on String[1]

      • validatePassword

        public static boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String password,
                                       java.lang.String salt,
                                       java.lang.String correctHash)
                                throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                       java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
